arts.ttl: Real Madrid XI vs Liverpool – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Liverpool and Real Madrid lock horns at Anfield on Tuesday in one of the standout fixtures of the Champions League group phase. Real Madrid arrive in sensational form, having won their last six matches. Xabi Alonso’s side demolished Valencia 4-0 on Saturday, with Kylian Mbappe scoring twice and Jude Bellingham continuing his resurgence. arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Xabi Alonso will face one of his old teams, which he represented as a player, as Real Madrid take on Liverpool in Matchday 4 of the Champions League. Alonso spoke to the media ahead of the game against Liverpool at Anfield.

arts.ttl: Fresh injury blow leaves Real Madrid without four players for Liverpool battle
arts.sum: Real Madrid suffer a fresh injury blow ahead of Tuesday's Champions League game against Liverpool, with summer arrival Franco Mastantuono ruled out of the contest.
